verses.verse: למנצח <WH5329> To the chief Musician, לדוד <WH1732> of David. אמר <WH559> hath said נבל <WH5036> The fool בלבו <WH3820> in his heart, אין <WH369> no אלהים <WH430> God. השׁחיתו <WH7843> They are corrupt, התעיבו <WH8581> they have done abominable עלילה <WH5949> works, אין <WH369> none עשׂה <WH6213> that doeth טוב׃ <WH2896> good.

יהוה <WH3068> The LORD משׁמים <WH8064> from heaven השׁקיף <WH8259> looked down על <WH5921> upon בני <WH1121> the children אדם <WH120> of men, לראות <WH7200> to see הישׁ <WH3426> if there were משׂכיל <WH7919> any that did understand, דרשׁ <WH1875> seek את <WH853> אלהים׃ <WH430> God.

הכל <WH3605> They are all סר <WH5493> gone aside, יחדו <WH3162> they are together נאלחו <WH444> become filthy: אין <WH369> none עשׂה <WH6213> that doeth טוב <WH2896> good, אין <WH369> no, גם <WH1571> not אחד׃ <WH259> one.

הלא <WH3808> no ידעו <WH3045> knowledge? כל <WH3605> Have all פעלי <WH6466> the workers און <WH205> of iniquity אכלי <WH398> who eat up עמי <WH5971> my people אכלו <WH398> they eat לחם <WH3899> bread, יהוה <WH3068> upon the LORD. לא <WH3808> not קראו׃ <WH7121> and call
שׁם <WH8033> There פחדו <WH6342> were they in great fear: פחד <WH6343> were they in great fear: כי <WH3588> for אלהים <WH430> God בדור <WH1755> in the generation צדיק׃ <WH6662> of the righteous.
עצת <WH6098> the counsel עני <WH6041> of the poor, תבישׁו <WH954> Ye have shamed כי <WH3588> because יהוה <WH3068> the LORD מחסהו׃ <WH4268> his refuge.

מי <WH4310> יתןציון <WH6726> ישׁועת <WH3444> the salvation ישׂראל <WH3478> of Israel בשׁוב <WH7725> bringeth back יהוה <WH3068> when the LORD שׁבות <WH7622> the captivity עמו <WH5971> of his people, יגל <WH1523> shall rejoice, יעקב <WH3290> Jacob ישׂמח <WH8055> shall be glad. ישׂראל׃ <WH3478> Israel
